title: An exposition of the Symbole or Creed of the Apostles according to the tenour of the Scriptures, and the consent of orthodoxe Fathers of the Church. By William Perkins.
author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Legatt, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1595. And are to be solde [by R. Bankworth] at the signe of the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard in London,
notes: Running title reads: An exposition of the Creede.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
